connect.title: connect your wallet
connect.desc: Connect WEPIN wallet and explore more about BREAMP!
connect.caution: You can create only one wallet per one account.

term.all: I agree to all the terms and conditions below.
term.provision: provision of personal information to a third party
term.caution: User agrees to provide their information from wepin wallet to breamp.

create.pin: enter a 6 to 8 digit pin code and click continue. the pin code cannot contain anything but numbers only.
create.reenter: to continue, please re-enter your pin code to verify your identity.
create.caution1: this username is taken. try another.
create.caution2: usernames can only include letters from a to z.
create.caution3: your username must be between 2 and 27 characters long. it can only contain any letters from a to z AND numbers.

done.title: WALLET CREATED!
done.desc: Whoa! You just created WEPIN wallet and joined BREAMP. Here is your wallet address. Welcome onboard!
